abstract: New York City Bar Assn survey finds some of largest law firms in city have made little advancement on including women and minorities in their ranks; finds white males make up 75 percent of partnerships overall.

headline.print_headline: Leading New York Law Firms Lag on Diversity, Survey Says
headline.main: Leading New York Law Firms Lag in Including Women and Minorities

snippet: Some of the nation’s most profitable firms were required for the first time to complete a benchmarking survey to give a better picture of their makeup....
lead_paragraph: Some of the nation’s most profitable firms were required for the first time to complete a benchmarking survey to give a better picture of their makeup.
